column5: Hi all, Got to fish the last day of walleye season in the boat, had done awesome in the same spot from shore (thats another video coming soon) but had to get out in the boat just because that does not happen that often up here and usually we are still on the ice. My buddies came out with me and we had a hoot, nothing too big but enough for a supper in the near future.VIDEO LINKhttps://youtu.be/J_FSzWVKpZU Tight lines!!! Simon.
How to use the ss ice breaker to get to another spot .. lolOur shore fishing was good as well . prov1800 and I missed you out there.

Got me all teary eyed hear Ken....lol. More adventures coming this season I hope with the three amigos, thats if you guys get any time between guiding. i had to stay local the last few days, kid and wife were thinking I'd moved out....lol.
Looks like Brule Narrows on Eagle Lake to me........
We will do our best to all get together this summer .. I will shoot you a text when I get some free time ..
